verses.verse: Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> assembled <S%H6950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, "These <S%H428><s%> are the things <S%H1697><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> [you] to do. <S%H6213><s%>

"For six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> may be done, <S%H6213><s%> but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> a holy <S%H6944><s%> [day,] a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of complete <S%H7677><s%> rest <S%H7677><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> does <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%> on it shall be put <S%H4191><s%> to death. <S%H4191><s%>
"You shall not kindle <S%H1197><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> in any <S%H3605><s%> of your dwellings <S%H4186><s%> on the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

'Take <S%H3947><s%> from among you a contribution <S%H8641><s%> to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> whoever <S%H3605><s%> is of a willing <S%H5081><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> let him bring <S%H935><s%> it as the Lord's contribution: <S%H8641><s%> gold, <S%H2091><s%> silver, <S%H3701><s%> and bronze, <S%H5178><s%>
and blue, <S%H8504><s%> purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> goats' [hair,]
and rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed <S%H119><s%> red, <S%H119><s%> and porpoise <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%>
and oil <S%H8081><s%> for lighting, <S%H3974><s%> and spices <S%H1314><s%> for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and for the fragrant <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%>
and onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> and setting <S%H4394><s%> stones, <S%H68><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%> and for the breastpiece. <S%H2833><s%>

'And let every <S%H3605><s%> skillful <S%H2450><s%> <S%H3820><s%> man <S%H2450><s%> <S%H3820><s%> among you come, <S%H935><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded: <S%H6680><s%>

the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> its tent <S%H168><s%> and its covering, <S%H4372><s%> its hooks <S%H7165><s%> and its boards, <S%H7175><s%> its bars, <S%H1280><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> and its sockets; <S%H134><s%>
the ark <S%H727><s%> and its poles, <S%H905><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat, <S%H3727><s%> and the curtain <S%H6532><s%> of the screen; <S%H4539><s%>
the table <S%H7979><s%> and its poles, <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> and the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the Presence; <S%H6440><s%>
the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> also for the light <S%H3974><s%> and its utensils <S%H3627><s%> and its lamps <S%H5216><s%> and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light; <S%H3974><s%>

and the altar <S%H4196><s%> of incense <S%H7004><s%> and its poles, <S%H905><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and the fragrant <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the doorway <S%H6607><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle; <S%H4908><s%>

the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> with its bronze <S%H5178><s%> grating, <S%H4346><s%> its poles, <S%H905><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its stand; <S%H3653><s%>
the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> its pillars <S%H5982><s%> and its sockets, <S%H134><s%> and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court; <S%H2691><s%>
the pegs <S%H3489><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the pegs <S%H3489><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> and their cords; <S%H4340><s%>

the woven <S%H8278><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> for ministering <S%H8334><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place, the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> to minister <S%H3547><s%> as priests. <S%H3547><s%>' "
Then all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> departed <S%H3318><s%> from Moses' presence. <S%H6440><s%>

And everyone <S%H3605><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred <S%H5375><s%> him and everyone <S%H3605><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> moved <S%H5068><s%> him came <S%H935><s%> [and] brought <S%H935><s%> the Lord's contribution <S%H8641><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and for all <S%H3605><s%> its service <S%H5656><s%> and for the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments. <S%H899><s%>

Then all <S%H3605><s%> whose hearts <S%H3820><s%> moved <S%H5081><s%> them, both men <S%H376><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> came <S%H935><s%> [and] brought <S%H935><s%> brooches <S%H2397><s%> and earrings <S%H5141><s%> and signet <S%H2885><s%> rings <S%H2885><s%> and bracelets, <S%H3558><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> articles <S%H3627><s%> of gold; <S%H2091><s%> so [did] every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> presented <S%H5130><s%> an offering <S%H8573><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

And every <S%H3605><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had <S%H4672><s%> in his possession <S%H854><s%> blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material] and fine <S%H8336><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> and goats' [hair] and rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed <S%H119><s%> red <S%H119><s%> and porpoise <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> them.

Everyone <S%H3605><s%> who could make <S%H7311><s%> a contribution <S%H8641><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> and bronze <S%H5178><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the Lord's contribution; <S%H8641><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> man, who <S%H834><s%> had <S%H4672><s%> in his possession <S%H854><s%> acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> for any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> of the service, <S%H5656><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> it.

And all <S%H3605><s%> the skilled <S%H2450><s%> <S%H3820><s%> women <S%H802><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> with their hands, <S%H3027><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> what <S%H4299><s%> they had spun, <S%H4299><s%> [in] blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> [and] scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material] and [in] fine <S%H8336><s%> linen. <S%H8336><s%>
And all <S%H3605><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> stirred <S%H5375><s%> with a skill <S%H2451><s%> spun <S%H2901><s%> the goats' [hair.]

And the rulers <S%H5387><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> the onyx <S%H7718><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> and the stones <S%H68><s%> for setting <S%H4394><s%> for the ephod <S%H646><s%> and for the breastpiece; <S%H2833><s%>
and the spice <S%H1314><s%> and the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%> and for the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and for the fragrant <S%H5561><s%> incense. <S%H7004><s%>

The Israelites, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H1121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> and women, <S%H802><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> moved <S%H5068><s%> them to bring <S%H935><s%> [material] for all <S%H3605><s%> the work, <S%H4399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> to be done, <S%H6213><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> a freewill <S%H5071><s%> offering <S%H5071><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "See, <S%H7200><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has called <S%H7121><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%> Bezalel <S%H1212><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uri, <S%H221><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

"And He has filled <S%H4390><s%> him with the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> in wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> in understanding <S%H8394><s%> and in knowledge <S%H1847><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> craftsmanship; <S%H4399><s%>
to make <S%H2803><s%> designs <S%H4284><s%> for working <S%H6213><s%> in gold <S%H2091><s%> and in silver <S%H3701><s%> and in bronze, <S%H5178><s%>

and in the cutting <S%H2799><s%> of stones <S%H68><s%> for settings, <S%H4390><s%> and in the carving <S%H2799><s%> of wood, <S%H6086><s%> so as to perform <S%H6213><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> inventive <S%H4284><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

"He also has put <S%H5414><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%> to teach, <S%H3384><s%> both he and Oholiab, <S%H171><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahisamach, <S%H294><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Dan. <S%H1835><s%>

"He has filled <S%H4390><s%> them with skill <S%H2451><s%> <S%H3820><s%> to perform <S%H6213><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> of an engraver <S%H2796><s%> and of a designer <S%H2803><s%> and of an embroiderer, <S%H7551><s%> in blue <S%H8504><s%> and in purple <S%H713><s%> [and] in scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material,] and in fine <S%H8336><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and of a weaver, <S%H707><s%> as performers <S%H6213><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> and makers <S%H2803><s%> of designs. <S%H4284><s%>
